review_title: Beware of Fake Positive LMC Reviews

cons: 2018 Benefits will cost employees an arm and a leg.  Plan pays nothing until you drain your personal accounts of nearly $7,000 a year.  You're going to put people into bankruptcy.  If you work there, time to polish up your resume.

paid for education and training classes that were applicable to the current job.
competent local technical staff was dedicated to meeting customer requirements.
